task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 7 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create rate limiting middleware using Redis for API protection
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create rate_limit.rs module with sliding window algorithm 2. Implement middleware that checks Redis counters per IP/user 3. Configure limits: 100 req/min for authenticated users, 20 req/min for anonymous 4. Use Redis EXPIRE and INCR commands for efficient counting 5. Return 429 Too Many Requests with Retry-After header 6. Add rate limit headers to all responses (X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining)

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-7): Implement rate limiting middleware

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Unit tests for rate limiting logic and load tests to verify limits are enforced correctly
